summary: Completed comprehensive testing of My Dammaiguda civic engagement platform. All backend APIs working perfectly (16/16 tests passed). Frontend testing successful with Telugu-first design, authentication flow, and all major features functional.
passed_tests: OTP authentication flow with mock OTP (123456)
Issue reporting with categories (dump_yard, garbage, drainage, water, roads, lights, parks)
Dump yard info with pollution zones and health risks
Expenditure transparency page (shows no data message when empty)
Language toggle between Telugu and English

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major functionality working, minor selector issues in automated testing)
